name: IFoRE International Forum on Research Excellence
content: Be part of IFoRE 2022! The four-day hybrid conference will showcase Key Thoughts from scientists, engineers, students, artists, and supporters of science worldwide to participate in discussions and demonstrations of excellence in the research enterprise. Professionals and students are invited to submit abstract proposals for thematic and mission-related Key Thought sessions. Learn more at experienceifore.org
organizers: Sigma Xi, The Scientific Research Honor Society
